title: Snapping business with SBI, PNB: Karnataka pauses its circular for 15 days after two banks pledge to resolve issue
description: Chief Minister Siddaramaiah asked the Finance Department to hold off for 15 days on an order for government bodies to withdraw deposits from SBI and PNB. The decision followed long-standing fraud issues involving government deposits. Both banks requested more time to resolve these matters, and the Chief Minister accepted their plea.
